actionMenu.sendUnit: Second a unit but keep the unit linked to the patrol for action points calculation and allow to move the unit or perform a unit action
actionMenu.intelligence: Command a unit to begin an intelligence action
actionMenu.recognition: Second a group of unit, move them to an adjacente zone and perform a recognition action
actionMenu.cache: Command the patrol to establish a cache to store spare parts, ammunition, gasoline
actionMenu.maintenance: Command a unit to repair and/or supply on the field
actionMenu.lowProfil: The patrol keeps a low profile, does not move and covers its tracks. This action consumes allthe AP.
